attributes.action: Take action about housing associations and councils giving 3+ bedroom houses to People who will be under occupying them
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Housing assosiations and councils are giving 3+ bed houses to familys that will be under occupying the premises (eg. single parent of 1 child given a 3 bedroom palour house)
The government need to review these situations as this is causing many familys to live in overcrowded conditions.
